attributes.additional_details: Put the pedestrian before the car. Petition to ban parking with wheels on the pavement, there's no need. Park on the road, cars will just have to slow down. New-build pavements should not have slopes for driveways, but remain level, cars need only a smooth kerb stone, again slows cars down. Similarly, pavements should cross minor roads at junctions, cars can go up and over. All this will slow cars and encourage walking, and cycling.
